quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
author: Rumi

quote: The Bay of Bengal is hit frequently by cyclones. The months of November and May, in particular, are dangerous in this regard.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If You Can'T Make It Good, At Least Make It Look Good.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Heart be brave. If you cannot be brave, just go. Love's glory is not a small thing.
author: Rumi

quote: It is bad for a young man to sin; but it is worse for an old man to sin.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: If You Are Out To Describe The Truth, Leave Elegance To The Tailor.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: While children are struggling to be unique, the world around them is trying all means to make them look like everybody else.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: These Capitalists Generally Act Harmoniously And In Concert, To Fleece The People.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I Don'T Believe In Failure. It Is Not Failure If You Enjoyed The Process.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Do not get elated at any victory, for all such victory is subject to the will of God.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
author: Rumi

quote: If you even dream of beating me you'd better wake up and apologize.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Will Praise Any Man That Will Praise Me.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: One Of The Greatest Diseases Is To Be Nobody To Anybody.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I'm so fast that last night I turned off the light switch in my hotel room and was in bed before the room was dark.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: People Must Learn To Hate And If They Can Learn To Hate, They Can Be Taught To Love.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
author: Rumi

quote: The less of the World, the freer you live.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit.
author: Rumi

quote: The Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: God Doesn'T Require Us To Succeed, He Only Requires That You Try.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Speak any language, Turkish, Greek, Persian, Arabic, but always speak with love.
author: Rumi

quote: Happiness comes towards those which believe in him.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Knowledge is of two kinds: that which is absorbed and that which is heard. And that which is heard does not profit if it is not absorbed.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: When I am silent, I have thunder hidden inside.
author: Rumi

quote: Technological Progress Is Like An Axe In The Hands Of A Pathological Criminal.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: No One Would Choose A Friendless Existence On Condition Of Having All The Other Things In The World.
author: Aristotle

quote: Life is a gamble. You can get hurt, but people die in plane crashes, lose their arms and legs in car accidents; people die every day. Same with fighters: some die, some get hurt, some go on. You just don't let yourself believe it will happen to you.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The End Of Life Is To Be Like God, And The Soul Following God Will Be Like Him.
author: Socrates

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: In every religion there is love, yet love has no religion.
author: Rumi

quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself.
author: Rumi

quote: I'm not a handsome guy, but I can give my hand to someone who needs help. Beauty is in the heart, not in the face.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: What Do I Wear In Bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, Of Course.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A Good Head And A Good Heart Are Always A Formidable Combination.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The Soul Never Thinks Without A Picture.
author: Aristotle

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.
author: Rumi

quote: Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground.
author: Rumi

quote: If You Like Your Brother And He'S Prospering, You'Ll Be Pleased For Him.
author: Hamad Bin Isa Al Khalifa

quote: Success Is Dependent Upon The Glands - Sweat Glands.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Champions are not generated from the championship. Champion is generated from something they have in them, desires, dreams, and visions.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: No matter what is the environment around you, it is always possible to maintain your brand of integrity.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Applause Waits On Success.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Just As Courage Imperils Life, Fear Protects It.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: It'S Better To Be A Lion For A Day Than A Sheep All Your Life.
author: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: The Devil'S Voice Is Sweet To Hear.
author: Stephen King

quote: Sometimes the people with the worst past, create the best future.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Every day, nay every moment, try to do some good deed.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: No Matter What People Tell You, Words And Ideas Can Change The World.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Champions have to have the skill and the will. But the will must be stronger than the skill.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Men Occasionally Stumble Over The Truth, But Most Of Them Pick Themselves Up And Hurry Off As If Nothing Had Happened.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
author: Rumi

quote: The best revenge is to improve yourself.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: God gave me this illness to remind me that I'm not Number One; He is.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success Is A Personal Standard, Reaching For The Highest That Is In Us, Becoming All That We Can Be.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When You Have Really Exhausted An Experience You Always Reverence And Love It.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Now you see me, now you don't. George thinks he will, but I know he won't!
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Elegance Does Not Consist In Putting On A New Dress.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: It Is Always Consoling To Think Of Suicide: In That Way One Gets Through Many A Bad Night.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Eating Words Has Never Given Me Indigestion.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: India has to be transformed into a developed nation, a prosperous nation and a healthy nation, with a value system.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: It's not bragging if you can back it up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Wish People Would Love Everybody Else The Way They Love Me. It Would Be A Better World.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Why do I want my wife to show off her panties when the wind blows? Horses show their behinds, and cows and mules, not humans.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Words Are Only Painted Fire; A Look Is The Fire Itself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Words, Without Power, Is Mere Philosophy.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: The cure for pain is in the pain.
author: Rumi

quote: Whatever happens, just keep smiling and lose yourself in Love.
author: Rumi

quote: Do The Right Thing. It Will Gratify Some People And Astonish The Rest.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Only the soul knows what love is.
author: Rumi

quote: Earning of livelihood by following some profession is better than living on charity.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Burdens are the foundations of ease and bitter things the forerunners of pleasure.
author: Rumi

quote: Too Many Have Dispensed With Generosity In Order To Practice Charity.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Even the greatest was once a beginner. Don't be afraid to take that first step.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: No Great Intellectual Thing Was Ever Done By Great Effort.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To fight against one's desires is the greatest of all fights.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Innovation Distinguishes Between A Leader And A Follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: We Enjoy The Process Far More Than The Proceeds.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: When I Started Counting My Blessings, My Whole Life Turned Around.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: This being human is a guest house. Every morning a new arrival. Welcome and entertain them all!
author: Rumi

quote: All My Life I'Ve Looked At Words As Though I Were Seeing Them For The First Time.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Waiting Is Painful. Forgetting Is Painful. But Not Knowing Which To Do Is The Worse Kind Of Suffering.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Never Allow Someone To Be Your Priority While Allowing Yourself To Be Their Option.
author: Mark Twain

quote: To Jaw-Jaw Is Always Better Than To War-War.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: That'S The Real Trouble With The World, Too Many People Grow Up
author: Walt Disney

quote: It Is Easier To Stay Out Than Get Out.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The worst man is the one who sees himself as the best.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The World Breaks Everyone, And Afterward, Some Are Strong At The Broken Places.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Rule No.1: Never Lose Money. Rule No.2: Never Forget Rule No.1.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Convergence of our views on global trade issues under the WTO and our common resolve to combat terrorism provide a valuable base for mutual understanding.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Whenever You Find Yourself On The Side Of The Majority, It Is Time To Pause And Reflect.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Whatever Is Done For Love Always Occurs Beyond Good And Evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Things Should Be Made As Simple As Possible, But Not Any Simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

quote: All Truth Is Simple... Is That Not Doubly A Lie?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Money Is Only A Tool. It Will Take You Wherever You Wish, But It Will Not Replace You As The Driver.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses - behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
author: Muhammad Ali
